sense.def:
Bait
je hrana, ki jo nataknemo na trnek ali damo v past, da ulovimo ribe ali divje živali.

seg.quote: I took a slice of white bread to use as bait.

sense.def:
To bait a hook or trap
pomeni, da na trnek ali v past damo vabo.

S človekom ali predmetom, ki ga uporabimo
as a bait
, nekoga zapeljemo ali opogumimo, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: He's using my papers as a bait.

sense.def:
To bait someone
pomeni nekoga nalašč jeziti, da bi mu nagajali.
